TopicTitle: Aerobraking and aerocapture... the easy way: MECHJEB!!!

Articles.Content:
Hello!

Aerobraking and aerocapture is a more advanced technique but if you want to maximize efficiency, there is no way around it! A few challenge can be a lot easier if you use aerobraking!

[A complex website calculator](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24654)
